head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ROTH, SOPHIE GREEN

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ROTH, SOPHIE GREEN

block.p: ROTH-Sophie Green. On May 12, 2002. Beloved wife of the late Edward Green and Nathaniel Roth. Loving mother of Judy and mother-in-law of Ray Solomon. Dear sister of Justin N. Feldman and sister-in-law of Linda Fairstein. Sister-in-law of Esther Frankel and Martin Roth. Cherished aunt of Geoffery, Diane and Jane. Dear stepmother to Vivian and Don Lubin, Dr. Margaret Kind Roth and the late Steven Roth. Grandmother to Deborah Firfer, Andrew Roth, Miriam Dulny, Dora and Jed Lubin. Great-grandmother to Chana and Batya Dulny. Graveside service Tuesday, 2:30pm, Sharon Gardens Cemetery. For information call The Riverside, 212362-6600.
